Detailed Description

Execute behaviors in parallel.

There are two policies that control the flow of execution. The first is the policy for failure, and the second is the policy for success. For failure, the options are "fail when one child fails" and "fail when all children fail". For success, the options are similarly "complete when one child completes", and "complete when all children complete".
